![](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/EfthymisB/Shading_Kit_Maya)


## Shading_Kit_Maya
 Shading Kit for **Maya** and **Arnold** by Efthymis B.

---
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Windows-blue?logo=windows&logoColor=white)
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Linux-yellow?logo=linux&logoColor=white)
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-2.70-7aaf00?logo=python&logoColor=white)
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Maya-2018--2020-008080?logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white)

>1. Download the [files](https://github.com/EfthymisB/Shading_Kit_Maya/archive/refs/heads/main.zip).  
>2. Copy the folder `ShadingKit_python2` to `C:\Users\<UserName>\Documents\maya\scripts` or in your custom script directory.
>3. Create a shelf button and add the following code in the `Command/Python` tab:
>```python
>try:
>   reload(runUI)
>except NameError:
>   from ShadingKit_python2 import runUI
> ```
> *(or copy the code in the Script Editor, highlight everything and then **Click, Drag and Drop** it in the shelf)*
---

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Windows-blue?logo=windows&logoColor=white)
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Linux-yellow?logo=linux&logoColor=white)
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.0+-7aaf00?logo=python&logoColor=white)
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Maya-2022+-008080?logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white)

>1. Download the [files](https://github.com/EfthymisB/Shading_Kit_Maya/archive/refs/heads/main.zip).
>2. Copy the folder `ShadingKit_python3` to `C:\Users\<UserName>\Documents\maya\scripts` or in your custom script directory.
>3. Create a shelf button and add the following code in the `Command/Python` tab:
>```python
>import importlib
>try:
>   importlib.reload(runUI)
>except NameError:
>   from ShadingKit_python3 import runUI
> ```
> *(or copy the code in the Script Editor, highlight everything and then **Click, Drag and Drop** it in the shelf)*
---
